snippet.title: Bring to Light Trailer #2
snippet.description:
Game trailer for Red Meat Games' survival horror/puzzle game, Bring to Light. 

Available NOW on PC (with Virtual Reality on Vive and Oculus), PS4, Xbox One, Kongregate and Game Jolt!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/636720/Bring_to_Light/
PS4: https://store.playstation.com/en-ca/product/UP1649-CUSA13527_00-BRINGTOLIGHT0001
XboxOne: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/apps/9MV5R4JQJD4T
Kartridge: https://www.kartridge.com/games/RedMeatGames/bring-to-light
Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/BringtoLight/380574

Survive the Shadowspawn and uncover the mystery behind the Avatar of Darkness.

Play Bring to Light while wearing a heart rate monitor to make the game more intense!  (This feature available for PC, Vive and Oculus only.)

Website: http://www.redmeatgames.ca
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RedMeatGames/
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/redmeatgames
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/redmeatgames 
Watch on Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/redmeatgames
Watch on Mixer: https://mixer.com/RedMeatGames
